items.content: You should know that there are 5 types of starships in NMS. They can be found as different classified starships. They can be S,A,B or C classed/ranked

The higher the class the better is the quality of the ship. That means higher damage, life, etc.
There is no data to the average damage and life of the different classes yet

You can find starship terminals in space stations.
You need theese to upgrade or scrap your starship.
If you have multiple starships and you dont need one anymore, you can scap it there. You will get different components wich you can sell or install in your other staships.

You can also upgrade your starships Inventory at the starship terminal.
The more often you buy an inventory slot, the more expensive it gets
